data.name: XMenuProxyListener
desc: Listens for changes in menu items.

methods.name: menuChangedMultiple
desc: is called, if the content or graphical representation/state of the menu changes completely, for one or more menu items

methods.name: menuChangedSingle
desc: is called, if the content or graphical representation/state of the menu changes, by one property for one or more menu items

methods.name: menuItemDeleted
desc: is called, if one menu item designated by the ID, is deleted.
